name: Distance to start of area with reduced adhesion factor
resolution: 10 cm, 1 m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE

name: Distance to speed restriction due to Axle load
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE

name: Distance between two location reports from the train
description: The train has to report its location every D_CYCLOC meters.
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

spec.1111 \u2026 1111: The train has not to report cyclically its location.

name: Distance from the End of Authority to danger point
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

name: Distance to emergency stop location
description: Distance between the LRBG and the emergency stop location
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

name: Distance from End section timer start location to End of Authority
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Incremental distance to next change of gradient.
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

name: Distance from location where to connect/disconnect to a radio in-fill unit
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Distance to level transition
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

spec.32767: Now (The level transition is performed upon receipt of the order)

name: Incremental linking distance to next linked balise group
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Incremental distance between locations where the train has to report its position.
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Distance between EOLM and start of loop
description: The EOLM specifies the distance to the beginning of the loop transmission
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Distance between the last relevant balise group and the estimated front end of the train (the side of the active cab).
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Incremental distance to the next change of mode within the MA
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Maximum distance for overriding the train trip
description: This variable is part of the National Values
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Maximum distance for reversing in Post Trip mode
description: This variable is part of the National Values
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Roll away distance limit
description: This variable is part of the National Values and is used for Roll Away Protection and Reverse Movement Protection
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Maximum distance for running in Staff Responsible mode
description: This variable is part of the National Values
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: The distance from the End of Authority to the end of overlap
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

name: Route kilometre offset from the referencing balise
description: The geographical position reporting function uses this variables content as an offset from the referencing balise to the reference point.
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

name: Distance to RBC transition
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

name: Reference distance
description:
Distance between the LRBG and the new shifted location reference.
The positive values are in the nominal direction of the LRBG
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE.

spec.The negative value are coded in 2\u2019s: The negative value are coded in 2’s complement

name: Distance in RV mode
description: Distance that can be run in RV mode
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Distance from beginning of section to the Section Time-out stop location
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Distance in SR mode
description: Distance that can be run in SR mode
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Distance from overlap timer start location to End of Authority
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Distance to start of reversing permitted area
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Incremental distance to next discontinuity in a international SSP profile
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Distance to change in route suitability
description: The incremental distance to where the route suitability data changes.
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE

name: Distance from where on a track ahead free request shall be displayed
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Distance from where on a text shall be displayed
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

spec.1111 \u2026 1111: The display of the text shall not be distance limited.

name: Distance to start of empty profile
description: Distance to where initial states of the related track description in the packet shall be resumed
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE

name: Track condition distance
description: The incremental distance to where the track conditions change.
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE

name: Distance to change of traction
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depending on Q_SCALE

name: Distance to beginning of temporary speed restriction
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE

name: Distance to start of validity of national values
resolution: 10 cm, 1m or 10 m depends on Q_SCALE
